structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.text: The residents of state mental hospitals may manufacture and produce for their own use, or for sale, such articles, furniture, clothing, tools, products, and other supplies and engage in such labor or work of construction as may be approved by the Cabinet for Health and Family Services.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 319, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 264, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1) and (9). -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 57. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 161, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 216aa-54, 216aa-55.
